Simultaneous- Default setting for standard simultaneous turns.[n] [n]
Hybrid- Simultaneous at peace, sequential at war.[n] [n]
Fast Dynamic Timer- Players take turns simultaneously with a faster dynamic timer (15s base + 5s per city + 1s per unit).[n] [n]
Normal Dynamic Timer- Players take turns simultaneously with a standard dynamic timer (20s base + 5s per city + 3s per unit).[n] [n]
Normal Dynamic Timer +Wait- Same as Normal Dynamic Timer but includes a 1-second pause before and after each turn. This may help reduce desyncs.[n] [n]
